movies.title: Origine
movies.plot: It is 300 years into the future. Earth's environment had been devastated by mankind's own foolish plans and humankind is beleaguered by the sentient forests which they have awoken. The world balance is tipped when a young boy named Agito stumbles across a machine that glowed in a strange blue hue inside a forbidden sanctuary. The machine, which has preserved a beautiful girl named Tula from the past, is activated. Tula has a "mission" that had been entrusted to her by the past ...
movies.simplePlot: It is 300 years into the future. Earth's environment had been devastated by mankind's own foolish plans and humankind is beleaguered by the sentient forests which they have awoken. The ...

biography.bio: Ryô Katsuji was born on August 20, 1986 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Origine (2006), All About Lily Chou-Chou (2001) and Aegis (2005).
biography.name: Ryô Katsuji

biography.bio: Aoi Miyazaki was born on November 30, 1985 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Les enfants loups, Ame & Yuki (2012), The Great Passage (2013) and Eureka (2000). She was previously married to Sôsuke Takaoka.
biography.name: Aoi Miyazaki

biography.bio: Yûko Kotegawa was born on July 16, 1959 in Oita, Japan. She is an actress, known for The Makioka Sisters (1983), Origine (2006) and Station (1981). She was previously married to Ken Tanaka.
biography.name: Yûko Kotegawa

biography.bio: Masaru Hamaguchi is an actor, known for Origine (2006), FNS 27 HRS Television 27 (2013) and Ôra no izumi (2005).
biography.name: Masaru Hamaguchi

biography.bio: Toshikazu Fukawa is an actor and director, known for Origine (2006), Godzilla, Mothra and King Ghidorah: Giant Monsters All-Out Attack (2001) and Ultraman Tiga & Ultraman Dyna: Warriors of the Star of Light (1998). He was previously married to Kaori Tsuchiya.
biography.name: Toshikazu Fukawa

biography.bio: Ken'ichi Endô was born on June 28, 1961 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor and writer, known for Visitor Q (2001), The Raid 2 (2014) and Nobody Knows (2004).
biography.name: Ken'ichi Endô

biography.bio: Ren Ôsugi was born on September 27, 1951 in Tokushima, Japan as Takashi Ôsugi. He is an actor, known for Fireworks (1997), Le samouraï du crépuscule (2002) and Audition (1999).
biography.name: Ren Ôsugi

biography.bio: Omi Minami was born on July 13, 1968 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Origine (2006), Gintama (2006) and Hand Maid May (2001).
biography.name: Omi Minami

biography.bio: Atsuko Yuya was born on September 1, 1970 in Nagasaki, Japan. She is an actress, known for La traversée du temps (2006), Tokyo Godfathers (2003) and Resident Evil: Revelations (2012).
biography.name: Atsuko Yuya

biography.bio: Kurumi Mamiya is an actress, known for Ghost Stories (2000), Origine (2006) and Tengen toppa gurren lagann (2007).
biography.name: Kurumi Mamiya

biography.bio: Tomoko Kaneda was born on May 29, 1973 in Yokohama, Kanagawa, Japan. She is known for her work on Azumanga Daioh (2002), Azumanga daioh (2001) and Origine (2006). She has been married to Wataru Mori since November 22, 2013.
biography.name: Tomoko Kaneda

biography.bio: Hideyuki Tanaka was born on November 12, 1950 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor and assistant director, known for Les chevaliers du zodiaque (1986), Paprika (2006) and Space Runaway Ideon (1980).
biography.name: Hideyuki Tanaka

biography.bio: Mugihito was born on August 8, 1944 in Musashino, Japan as Makoto Terada. He is an actor, known for Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind (1984), Neon Genesis Evangelion: The End of Evangelion (1997) and Tekkonkinkreet (2006).
biography.name: Mugihito

biography.bio: Katsuhisa Hôki was born on October 29, 1946 in Nagasaki, Japan. He is known for his work on One Piece (1999), Sword of the Stranger (2007) and Origine (2006).
biography.name: Katsuhisa Hôki

biography.bio: Takehiro Koyama is an actor, known for Cowboy Bebop: The Movie (2001), Appleseed (2004) and Origine (2006).
biography.name: Takehiro Koyama
